name: /HABITATION/
description:
THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. YOU CAN DOWNLOAD A DEMO BELOW, BUT IT IS STILL VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT.

You are a contract investigator, hired by ExoGen Biostudies, tasked with uncovering the sequence of events that led to a devastating accident.

You are aboard Space Station Aurora, a state-of-the-art orbital laboratory stationed above the surface of Kepler-22b. 

You are over six hundred light-years from your home and your family.

Your job is to navigate through company files, data, logs, and personal messages using the station's computer system, I.S.A.A.C. It is crucial to acquire enough information to piece together the sequence of events that led to the lockdown and abandonment of the station.

/HABITATION/ is a story driven game played through a computer terminal. Players will progress through the story by solving puzzles, playing mini-games, and cracking passwords. There are lots of interesting creatures to learn about, private converstations to snoop around in, and some very interesting company secrets to uncover.
